title: Improvement of cycle life for layered oxide cathodes in sodium-ion batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,1756-1780

In this review, research progress on layered oxide cathodes for SIBs in recent years is summarized, with emphasis on the problems of poor cycle life caused by irreversible phase transition, Jahnâ€“Teller effect and interface deterioration, and several strategies are proposed to alleviate these issues.
